en.title: FE's PD Fellowship Dinner, 01st December 2008 (1)
en.content:
FE hosted a Fellowship Dinner for FE's Presidential Directors recently at the famous Ah Yat Abalone and Seafood Restaurant, Petaling Jaya. 50 of FE's PDs gathered together with their key down lines (PDs in the making!) and enjoyed a GREAT evening of dining, singing and motivational speeches. With FE, it is not just about the money but the PRIDE, the PASSION and the HAPPINESS that comes with it! We believe with great passion that what we are doing is good for society and success is now becoming a REALITY for us!

Highlights Of The Event Include:
 
- Entertainment by 5 piece Band.
 
- Presentation by Founder CEO, Paul Ting, on how FE utilises Blue Ocean Strategies to succeed. In the Blue Ocean, competition becomes irrelevant! Paul also played scenes from the movie "300". The scenes titled "What is Your Profession?", "Strategy", "Positive Attitude", "Never Give Up!", "United We Stand!", "Ahoo! Ahoo! Ahoo!", "Victory!" are applicable, not only 2,000 years ago but also today, where focus, committment and loyalty will determine one's success or failure.
 
- Presentation by Founder Director KS Lee on Network Marketing. Successfull networkers do not sell, they build power networks. If you can get your downlines to buy 2 sets of QP each (for their family to use, NOT to sell) and teach your downlines to duplicate the same process, you will be well on your way to be a successfull networker!
 
- PD Awards to KC Phoon (Top Earner), Rachael Thomas (Second Top Earner) and Jeffrey Chong (Third Top Earner). Congratulations!
 
- Top Stockist Award to Thailand's Jangkij (Received on behalf by PD Alex Long) and Top Country Licensee Award to Thailand's Don Chan (Received on behalf by PD Sam Ho). Congratulations!
 
- A token of Appreciation to Malaysia's latest World Class Bowling Sensation, QP Wearer, Sin Li Jane, who just won the Singles Gold and the Masters at the Commonwealth Tenpin Bowling Championships at Belfast, Ireland. FE is very proud of your achievements!
 
- Speeches by PDs Arthur Medina (Philippines), Rachel Thomas and KC Phoon. They are truly inspiring! FE is thankful we have such quality and class in our midst. How can we not conquer the world with leaders such as these standing beside us? Ahoo! Ahoo! Ahoo!
 
- Lucky Draws. A total of RM 20,000 of prizes including household appliances, cameras, laptops, TVs were won by lucky attendees! Winning tickets were drawn by FE Spokespersons Foo Kok Keong, Ms Law, Wong Hong and CEO Paul Ting. Congratulations!
 
- Door Gifts. Every guests was presented with a goody bag containing a bottle of FE's latest product, Scalar Energised RVT, brochures, etc.
 
Click Here For More Photos >>
